summary: The document is a declassified communication pertaining to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details discussions and briefings on Cuban subversion activities in Guatemala and El Salvador, including a request for perspectives on contacts and the potential participation of station chiefs in roundtable talks.
key_findings: References the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
Details arrangements for briefings regarding Cuban subversion in Guatemala and El Salvador.
Highlights a request for views on contacts and considers the involvement of station chiefs in discussions.
